jump_scares.spoiler: After Sara leaves the toilet Aaron jumps out and screams at her (as a joke)
Aaron attempts to scare Sara again as he jumps out from around a corner
Aaron opens the shower curtain in another attempt to scare Sara however she scares him first by screaming at him while wearing tape on her face
Sarah pops up in front of a window to scare Aaron
Aaron drops the camera at the base of a tree
Sara suddenly runs at Aaron while screaming
